org.trianacode.gui.components.map

Class MapLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trianacode.gui.components.map.MapLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.LayoutManager, TaskLayoutDetails

    public class MapLayout
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.LayoutManager, TaskLayoutDetails
    The layout manager responsible for positioning components on the map.
